Name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Bio: An American novelist and short story writer.

Name: George Orwell
Bio: An English novelist, essayist, and critic.

Name: J.K. Rowling
Bio: A British author best known for the Harry Potter series.

Name: Jane Austen
Bio: An English novelist known for her romantic fiction.

Name: Mark Twain
Bio: An American writer, humorist, and lecturer.

Name: Leo Tolstoy
Bio: A Russian writer regarded as one of the greatest authors of all time.

Name: Virginia Woolf
Bio: An English writer and feminist icon.

Name: Ernest Hemingway
Bio: An American novelist and short-story writer.

Name: Gabriel García Márquez
Bio: A Colombian novelist and Nobel Prize winner.

Name: Haruki Murakami
Bio: A Japanese writer known for his surreal and imaginative works.
